summary: This is a US Marshals Service prisoner schedule report for the Metropolitan Correctional Center (MCC) New York, dated July 31, 2019. It lists inmates scheduled for court appearances or meetings, including Jeffrey Epstein, who is noted for a status hearing and has special cautions for mental concerns and suicidal tendencies.

persons.name: Jeffrey Epstein
persons.context: Listed as an inmate at MCC New York scheduled for a status hearing before Judge Berman; document notes special cautions for mental concerns and suicidal tendencies, and offense listed as a sex offense.

persons.context: Listed as an inmate at MCC New York scheduled for court; offense listed as robbery.

events.title: Epstein's Scheduled Status Hearing
events.description: Jeffrey Epstein was scheduled for a status hearing in court before Judge Berman while incarcerated at MCC New York.

locations: MCC New York (Metropolitan Correctional Center, New York)
keyFacts: Jeffrey Epstein was an inmate at the Metropolitan Correctional Center (MCC) New York as of July 31, 2019.
The document lists Epstein's scheduled court activity as a 'Status Hearing' before Judge Berman.
Special cautions for Epstein are explicitly noted as 'Mental Concerns: Suicidal Tendencies'.
Epstein's listed offense is '3699 Sex Offense'.
The document is a routine prisoner schedule, showing Epstein was among many inmates with court appearances that day.
